title: Russia-Ukraine Peace Talks Stretch Into a Second Day
summary_full: Little has been made public so far, but negotiators were expected to talk about the fate of Ukrainian territory in the east and security guarantees for Ukraine.
summary_public: Little has been made public so far, but negotiators were expected to talk about the fate of Ukrainian territory in the east and security guarantees for Ukraine.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Russia-Ukraine Peace Talks Stretch Into a Second Day
